This provides further evidence (although weak evidence) that LSTMs, at least alone, are perhaps
a bad ﬁt for autoregressive-type sequence prediction problems.
Note: Given the stochastic nature of the algorithm, your speciﬁc results may vary. Consider
running the example a few times.
